title: Mood Board â€” Standardize button styling
description: Audit all action buttons inside mood board items. Remove emoji-based styling, standardize colors, and match the design system used across other Cortex pages.
acceptanceCriteria: No emoji-based button styling anywhere in mood board
Consistent color system across all mood board buttons
Matches Cortex design system (bg-surface, border-nativz-border, accent-text)

steps.details: Search mood board components for all button elements. List each button's current styling (classes, emojis, colors). Identify inconsistencies.
Replace any emoji characters in button labels with lucide-react icons or remove them entirely. Use icon + text pattern consistent with rest of app.
Apply consistent Button component variants. Primary actions use accent variant, secondary use ghost/outline. Ensure all buttons use the same padding, font-size, and border-radius patterns.
Test hover, active, focus, and disabled states for all buttons. Ensure consistent visual feedback.

technicalNotes: Mood board components are under components/moodboard/
Use the existing Button component from components/ui/button.tsx for consistency
